summary: A collection of pytest modules that exercise the Gemini language‑model client integration, checking prompt formatting, response parsing, handling of simple and complex Pydantic models, list and multimodal content, retry logic, streaming responses, and role‑based interactions.
business_intent: Validate that the Gemini LLM wrapper behaves correctly across diverse use‑cases so that downstream applications can rely on accurate data extraction, robust error handling, and proper support for various content types.
